boardgame.name: Making the Grade 2013
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

Making the Grade 2013 is a game supplement for the Heroic Visons: Superhero Role Playing Game. Inside you will find character sheets for heroes, villains and monsters to add to your superheroic campaigns. These characters come straight from Kinesis: The Zephaniah Chronicles. This is the first is a series of comic book tie-ins for Heroic Visions RPG system.

boardgame.name: Farlanders
boardgame.description:
UNRELEASED GAME – UNAVAILABLE




This game has officially been announced by the publisher or developer, and remains in development. Therefore, some of the game information may change in the future. Until this game is released, please do not submit images for it, nor add new releases. Press Kits are an exception.





Plan and build your martian settlement. Cater to the needs of your settlers or they might favor your rivals.User Summary

boardgame.name: Children of the Blood
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Do you know who considers faith among the dead a trivial concept — or worse, a new one?

Dullards and con artists.

These vampires want you to believe that religion is a new phenomenon among Kindred. They want you to believe only vampires on the periphery subscribe to the worship of higher powers or seek a greater cause.

They want you to believe this, because they want you to feel alone, without purpose, and disconnected from our true, spiritual — no, God-given — heritage and destinies. They’ll make you feel this way, and then they’ll be your friend, your only confidante, and they’ll have one hand in your pocket while the other measures your ribcage for the stake.

Do not trust these people. Trust us. Trust me. I didn’t survive for as long as I have through mundane means, through lack of conviction, or by fooling myself into believing there is nothing greater than myself in the world. Join me, and I can show the truth. I can be your friend and your confidante. There may be sacrifices along the way, but I promise, it will lead to your enlightenment.

Children of the Blood includes:

A broad selection of new SPCs to introduce into your stories as antagonists and supporting characters, with many linked to strange and dangerous cult organizations — some new for Children of the Blood, others expanding concepts introduced in Cults of the Blood Gods and Forbidden Religions.
Ready-made characters for players, along with coteries for them to form, allowing you to take material from this book and immediately play with it.
New Bloodlines, Loresheets, Merits, and Flaws, all available to help expand your playable options in a chronicle of Vampire: The Masquerade.

boardgame.name: Albion's Legacy: Deluxe Edition
boardgame.description:
The Kickstarter Deluxe Edition contains the base game and the following expansions: Avalon, Holy Grail, Hunters, Northumbria and Romance. It is also expandable for up to 6 players. More information can be found in the Wiki.


Albion's Legacy is a cooperative, modular-adventure board game for 1-4 players.

The game allows players to participate as one of their favourite Arthurian characters ranging from the legendary wizard Merlin, the famous Lady of the Lake, the brave Sir Lancelot, and the great King Arthur himself. These heroes will champion all that is good in 90 minutes as the players travel across the realm of Albion and face dangerous roaming threats, mythical beasts and deadly encounters.

Collect lore-enriched relics, artifacts, weapons and special awards under a heated deadline while solving some of the most famous historical and mythical chronicles of the Arthurian legend.

This game will challenge you, excite you, educate you and if you're not careful it will take you down. Everything you need is provided at the gaming table, just bring your friends, your love of Arthurian lore (knowledge of Arthurian lore optional) and your thirst for adventure! Onward! The Kingdom needs YOU!
boardgame.boardgamefamily: Theme: King Arthur / The Knights of the Round Table / Camelot

listing.notes: Kickstarter with everything Incl.

boardgame.name: Alien
boardgame.description: From the introduction:

boardgame.name: Escape from Mt. Balefor
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Escape from Mt. Balefor is a self-contained 8-10 hour adventure for three to five 5th level characters. This premium module contains a full three-part story, battle maps, and NPC stat blocks.

Your Mission

Your party of Wood Elves will start in the mines and have to sneak and backstab their way to freedom. There are a number of chances to choose your path, whether you plan to avoid fighting or want to kill every last High Elf in the mines.

There will also be a number of ways to affect the world around you if you choose to continue the story after the party escapes from the mines.

boardgame.name: The Heroes of Karatheon
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Heroes of Karatheon is a self-contained 6-7 hour 5e adventure for three to five 5th-level characters. This premium module includes:

A full three-part story that evolves based on the players’ performance and choices
Battle maps and custom NPC stat blocks
New rules for chariot racing, a 4-stage relay race, and a “capture the flag” encounter
A random table for 6 fleshed out Greek mythology-style encounters


Your Mission

A terrifying beast stalks the surrounding area of the port polis of Karatheon, destroying crops and endangering the lives of its citizens. The ruler of Karatheon, Archelaos Cirillo, has organized a tournament to crown a champion, bestowing upon them his blessing to slay the beast. Face off against other adventuring parties in the Colosseum, traverse the dangerous wilderness of the world of Korinthos, and hunt the beast in the mountains it calls home to claim eternal glory.

boardgame.name: Okko Chronicles: Cycle of Water – Oni Hunters
boardgame.description:
Cooperative and solo modes for Okko Chronicles: Cycle of Water. This expansion allows players to play solo or as a team against a card-controlled Oni opponent. A new deck of reaction cards aids in the execution of the 'AI' opponent and new boar overlays for the corruption track allow for beginner and expert levels of difficulty.

This pack consists of 15 mission cards, 18 adventure cards, 154 reaction cards, 23 activation tokens, 2 board overlays for the oni's corruption track, and a rules book to explain solo and cooperative gameplay.
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Okko Chronicles: Cycle of Water – Quest into Darkness

boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

The May 14, 2021 Friday Enhanced Map product contains a multi-layered PDF (allowing the options of white or black backgrounds, numbered or non-numbered areas, secret doors on or off, and grid or no grid) and a zip file with all relevant map files as individual jpg images.

Publisher's blurb:

The May 7, 2021 Friday Enhanced Map product contains a multi-layered PDF (allowing the options of white or black backgrounds, numbered or non-numbered areas, secret doors on or off, and grid or no grid) and a zip file with all relevant map files as individual jpg images.

Publisher's blurb:

The April 30, 2021 Friday Enhanced Map product contains a multi-layered PDF (allowing the options of white or black backgrounds, numbered or non-numbered areas, secret doors on or off, and grid or no grid) and a zip file with all relevant map files as individual jpg images.

Publisher's blurb:

The April 23, 2021 Friday Enhanced Map product contains a multi-layered PDF (allowing the options of white or black backgrounds, numbered or non-numbered areas, secret doors on or off, and grid or no grid) and a zip file with all relevant map files as individual jpg images.

boardgame.name: Walk'n'Wag
boardgame.description:
Your dog scratches at the door, their whole body wiggling with anticipation. They look back at you, tongue falling out of their mouth as they grin eagerly. Your best friend knows you are busy, and they have been very patient… but now it is time for a nice, long walk.

This is a solo game about walking good dogs, trying to tire them out while keeping them as happy as possible. Choose one of the eight dogs available, or follow simple rules to create your own! Randomized card draw and weather patterns mean you'll never take the same walk twice.

To play, all you need is a deck of playing cards, a pencil and paper, and a copy of the game.

Your dog has two stats: Satisfaction and Energy.


Your Walk ends when your Dog has 0 Energy and 10 Satisfaction, OR if you flip over every card.
Be careful! If your dog’s energy would ever drop below 0, they instead lose 1 Satisfaction!
If your dog’s Satisfaction would ever rise above 10, they instead gain 1 Energy!
At the end of the Walk, give yourself 1 point for every point of Satisfaction your Dog has, and subtract 1 point for every remaining point of Energy that your Dog has.
10 Points is a perfect score!

boardgame.name: Colour Dungeon #1
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

The Colour Dungeon #1 map is based on Friday Enhanced Map: 04-02-2021. It contains a multi-layered PDF (allowing the options of numbered or non-numbered areas, secret doors on or off, and grid or no grid) and a zip file with all relevant map files as individual jpg images.

boardgame.name: Running With a Mouthful of Toast
boardgame.description:
Your lousy alarm clock didn’t wake you up when it was supposed to - or did you hit the snooze button too many times? You can’t remember, and at this point, that’s not important!

Because you’re about to be late for school!

Quick, get dressed, grab your bag, and don’t forget to nab a piece of toast on the way out (even in these dire circumstances, the importance of breakfast can’t be understated)!

Running With a Mouthful of Toast is a one-player game blending the silliness of Saturday morning cartoons with a handful of screwball anime tropes.

Place 11 cards face-down in a row. Place one Joker at either end of the row of cards, and the other at the opposite end. Place your token on one of the Jokers. This is your home. And see that other Joker, all the way at the other end of the row? That’s your school. You know the route well, but that doesn’t mean you’re gonna make it without any unexpected complications.

Your Time starts at 5, and it’ll go down steadily, as it is known to do. You’ll want to track this number accordingly, perhaps with a die, a piece of paper, or your phone, but be warned - if it hits 0 before you make it to school, you’ll be sent to detention!

boardgame.name: Triumvir
boardgame.description:
It’s 60 BC, and the three most powerful men in Rome form a loose alliance based on marriage, self-interest, and a thirst for power. In Triumvir, you take the role of one of these Roman power brokers as you vie for power and position that inevitably leads to Civil War.

Triumvir builds on Versailles 1919 where players use influence to gain control over issues and the path that history will take going forward. In Triumvir, you will use your three-dimensional influence in popularity, money, and legions to vie for the Consulship, Pontifex Maximus, and Governorships as you try to outmaneuver your erstwhile friends on the floor of the Senate. The game can be played with 1 – 3 players.

During your turn, you will perform one of three actions: Place influence (popularity, money, or legions) on issues that are being debated in the Senate, Recover exhausted influence, or Settle an issue. These actions are punctuated by elections, revolts in the provinces, and domestic unrest. As one of the Triumvirs, you will have to balance your tempo of activities to ensure that you are not caught short on your ability to influence how events evolve and progress.

Although Triumvir uses many of the basic mechanics from Versailles 1919, the design is thematically aligned to its subject. When an issue settles, your choices will alter your popularity and resources where the Consul often gets his cut. Each player has a unique personality card that asymmetrically captures your personality’s strengths in how they gain and recover influence. These characteristics are enhanced by your growing tableau of patrons—some of whom bring additional resources.

Revolts are intense events where the Governor of the affected province has to re-establish Roman rule. Failure to do so carries tough popularity penalties whereas success raises your stature. If you put down a particularly epic revolt in a grand fashion you can be awarded a Triumph with extra legions, but remember—sic transit gloria. The tides of fate can often turn against you in the next election or foreign war.

This political danse macabre continues until the ‘Crossing the Rubicon’ issue ends the Roman Republic and brings on a Civil War or one player dominates faction standing. Can you prevail against your political rivals as you try to dominate Rome? Your seat at the table awaits you in Triumvir.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Frogmouth Fan Pack (fan expansion for Wingspan)
boardgame.description: A free, downloadable 15-card expansion by Travis Willse, featuring 14 species of frogmouths and one new bonus card, that was made available through the BGG website. All of the illustrations were taken from old lithographs, at least in most cases from the 19th Century.

boardgame.name: The Stars Fell on Blackmoor
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Even in a fairy tale, sometimes someone has to die.

Modern day survival horror in rural southern England

Blackmoor, Hampshire comes under assault by eldritch horrors, on The Night The Stars Fell. All that remains is a small group of Humans, their pet Dogs and Cats, and perhaps a few extraordinary individuals, sane or not, good or not, to try and survive.

The Stars Fell On Blackmoor is an adventure module. That means that this book is a story, able to be told by one player to the other players, or shared by more than one player and told around the table as a gaming session.

The plan is to follow the story provided, use the elements given and see how the adventures suggested play out. However, there are other approaches for which this book can also be used. The adventures can be disregarded or rewritten to suit a different story that the player want to tell.

Also this adventure is set in a post-disaster modern day world, where many of the fantasy races would not normally be appropriate. However a player might want a science fantasy game with those races included. That would require some changes of necessity. There are Story Elements provided as introductory material. This may be enjoyable to read when preparing to tell the story. They could also be read aloud. After each Story Element comes the challenge and rules for that part of the story. At the end, is the end of the Story Elements and the possible resolution. However, the whole point of WHITEFRANK is to tell your own stories in your own way. Therefore, all this adventure module ultimately becomes is a series of SUGGESTIONS to help you TELL YOUR OWN STORIES!

Blackmoor was where it all began.

THERE WERE INDEED EVENTS BEFORE, THAT HAD GONE UNNOTICED, but the truth is, it all began with Blackmoor.

Lots of maps, detailed mysterious alien? monsters, Time Travel rules and a Timestream Manipulation item, modern armor, items and weapons, floorplans and some victory conditions (such as they can be in survival horror).

boardgame.name: WHITEFRANK
WHITEFRANK RPG: You're Telling the Story!
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

WHITEFRANK is a cooperative story telling roleplaying game. Each character has six Attributes, which may well be different from those of all the other players' characters! Together with four skills that is all that is need to start telling YOUR story!

However, there are also character classes, Powers, Problems and Skills, as well as various rules. But the rules ultimately will be set "Minnesota style" by the players as a group agreeing how they want the rules of their shared story to proceed.

WHITEFRANK has a strong focus on fantasy but the system is extremely powerful and can handle any kind of story telling the group wants to do.

boardgame.name: WHITEFRANK Classes
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

WHITEFRANK features optional character classes. This supplement provides the original classes combined with many news classes of every kind- animals, science fantasy characters from the Moon, a couple of H.P. Lovecraft creatures from the public domain, Cowboys, Horse Nomads, freakish humanoids, some oriental old favorites and more!

Also includes a campaign concept with an evil Emperor and two of his Lieutenants as well as character class information for his infamous Undead guardsmen.

boardgame.name: WHITEFRANK Rosanebel
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

ROSANEBEL is a town situated in a mountain pass between two armes waging a continent-wide war.

However, that war is not the focus. The focus is the town, its many different residents (all notable ones details and examples of many more), its immediate neighbours including the Brothel in the Cliff, a Casino hiding an Eldritch Horror, a Finishing School for Young Ladies, a Baron obsessed with resurrecting dead flesh, a Count who doesn't like attending Church, Merchants and their Barbarian Swordsmen, a spy who is mistress of disguise and so much more!

The main locations in the town are mapped, with a random generator for more buildings. All notable people are fully detailed according to WHITEFRANK rules and easily used in any other OSR system, or really in any system. Detailed descriptions, flavor text, insights, politics, plots, adventure ideas and STILL more.

New monsters, including an existential threat in the form of the Venom Grubs and ther Venom Kin (a new character class).

New items, new spells, and new challenges.

A waterfall and its ledges, each containing something different!

The Town Dump, lair of the Toilet Hobos and Toilet Witches, Trash Pigs, and other ecologically adapted threats!

The Neapolitan Nightmare - a big quivering blob of delicious smelling evil!

This is a campaign book, in the old school sense, and it is possible to just keep telling stories in Rosanebel. There are numerous charts, for everything from random encounters (not just with monsters) to Weather and effects of freezing temperatures and more.

A significant number of new creatures are provided, locally tailored to each area. And three different versions of a Yeti in one area - the Snow Gorilla, Devil Bear and Yueh Teh.

Rosanebel also has Anarchists, conservative Students, foreign diplomats, local crooks, a vampire Count with a plan to take over the world, and Marionette, the Mistress of Espionage.

There is even a summary of local laws that can get a player's character thrown in prison, how long that will be for, and what they can expect.

Rosanebel is hopefully a living breathing place, where negotiation and roleplaying are essential because some threats are too severe for mindless dice rolls and violence. And this all takes place against the backdrop of politics, the possible extinction of some character classes and religious tensions between the High Church of the One True Way, the Elves and the worship of the Old Gods!

boardgame.name: WHITEFRANK Item Catalogue
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

WHITEFRANK Item Catalogue is a book of lists of items, weapons, armor, slaves, hirelings, gems and even three monsters and a new character class (Merchant) as well as a range of Quality ratings for items - Crude, Lowly, Normal, Royal, Enchanted, Legendary and Mythic. The items are well described and can fit in any OSR game but are intended for use with WHITEFRANK story telling RPG primarily.

boardgame.name: Builders Pack 5
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

As you know some of our older assets feel a bit outdated and don’t really fit our style anymore as it evolved over the years.
With this pack, we revamped and updated our Palisades, bringing them up to our new standards

Total # of Assets in this pack: 307!

boardgame.name: Builders Pack 6
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

With this pack, we are trying to fill some gaps in our library and also update the “Old” assets, bringing them up to our new standards

We have a lot of new Door and Window options as well as some bonus stuff/addons like Knockers, Knobs, Arrowslits etc.
Total # of Assets in this pack: 1115!

boardgame.name: Creature Tokens Pack 18
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

All tokens are in PNG format and high resolution (400dpi) just in case you need a bigger version
(for example Enlarge spell) you wont lose any detail.

Additional batch of SRD Creatures

This pack contains 9 new Creature Tokens, each with multiple color variants

boardgame.name: Bases for the Weary Adventurer
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

At the end of the day, even the most road weary adventuring party needs a place where they might toss their boots in the corner and hang their elven cloak. This small supplement provides rules for a quick system that players and DMs (Dungeon Masters) can use to create bases of operations. Having a base of operations gives adventuring parties a connection to the world you have created, while conferring small advantages. Many times, in fantasy RPG’s player characters (PCs) end up with more money than they know what to do with, and this gives PCs an appropriate way to spend their hard earned (stolen, taken, or looted) monies.

boardgame.name: Tower Beneath the Waves
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

At the end of the day, even the most road weary adventuring party needs a place where they might toss their boots in the corner and hang their elven cloak. This small supplement provides rules for a quick system that players and DMs (Dungeon Masters) can use to create bases of operations. Having a base of operations gives adventuring parties a connection to the world you have created, while conferring small advantages. Many times, in fantasy RPG’s player characters (PCs) end up with more money than they know what to do with, and this gives PCs an appropriate way to spend their hard earned (stolen, taken, or looted) monies.

boardgame.name: Lock and Key (5E)
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Since the dawn of fantasy roleplaying games, opening locks has been a staple of fantasy adventures. This mini-supplement for the worlds most popular roleplaying game is filled with information about locks and how to open them.

boardgame.name: The Order of the Kaulantor
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Masters of the black arts, necromancers of the Order of the Kaulantor work to bring about the end of the gods creation. Insidious and underhanded, the Order of the Kaulantor guide will give you drop and use background, characrers and includes random encounter tables, locations and quest hooks.

boardgame.name: Superstico
boardgame.description:
Superstico is a 18 cards superstition party game for all the family. Cast spells with funny effects or try to use magical protections to avoid them.

There are a total of 6 different spells. You will find a special supreme spell type and 5 regular spells. Each of those 5 speels have 2 types of effects (An inmediate funny effect and a restriction or prohibition effect to have into consideration from next roudn unless you manage to get rid of that curse).

The game last 3 rounds where you will cast spells to other players and try to avoid or get rid of other spells casted against you.

The player who has less active curses by the end of the game will be the winner.

—description from the designer

Superstico es un juego de superstición tipo party de 18 cartas para toda la familia. Lanza hechizos con efectos graciosos o trata de usar protecciones mágicas para evitarlos.

Hay un total de 6 hehcizos diferentes. Podrás encontrar un tipo de hechizo supremo y 5 hehcizos normales. Cada uno de esos 5 tipos de hechizos tiene un efecto diferente (Un efecto inmediato y divertido y una restricción o prohibición que tendrás que tener en cuenta a partir de la siguiente ronda a menos que consigas librarte de esa maldición).

El juego dura 3 rondas donde tendrás que lanzar hechizos a otros jugadores y procurar evitar o librarte de otros hechizos lanzados en tu contra.

El jugador que tenga menos maldiciones activas al final de la partida será el vencedor.

—description from the designer (Spanish)

boardgame.name: The Goonies: Never Say Die
boardgame.description:
It's our time, down here.

Embark on a perilous adventure full of dangerous booby traps and treacherous treasure-filled caverns! In The Goonies: Never Say Die, one player is the Goondocks Master, controlling fearsome foes from the outlaw family, the Fratellis, to the legendary pirate, One-Eyed Willie. The other players take on the role of the Goonies — Mikey, Mouth, Chunk, Data, and Sloth — and attempt to overcome cryptic puzzles and deadly challenges with teamwork, strategy, and Data's clever contraptions! Will the Goonies discover the legendary riches that will save their homes, or will they follow the fate of Chester Copperpot...and never see the light of day?

The game features nine adventures so that players can immerse themselves in the 1980s movie as well as brand new stories, and it includes eight sculpted miniatures of Mikey, Mouth, Chunk, Data, Sloth, the Giant Octopus, the Fratellis, and even One-Eyed Willie himself.
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: The Goonies: Under the Goondocks – A Never Say Die Expansion
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: RA episode 73 Goonies and Steamed Hams

boardgame.name: Galactic (2nd Edition)
boardgame.description:
Publisher Blub
Galactic is a belonging outside belonging game, inspired by Star Wars.

Tell the character-driven, relationship-focused space opera stories you want to see in the world, using playbook archetypes like THE ACE, THE DEFECTOR, and THE DIPLOMAT, and create a unique and colorful world with pillars, places, and traits that flesh out different factions, forces, and characters in your story.

boardgame.name: Amazing Heroes
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Amazing Heroes is inspired by shows like The Flash, Young Justice, Daredevil, Raising Dion and Agents of Shield. If you’re a fan of superhero shows and would love to be part of one, then Amazing Heroes is for you.

As a game Amazing Heroes is:

Very fast. Amazing Heroes is very quick to play. A single session should be able to cram in as much excitement as an hour-long superhero show.

Very flexible. Amazing Heroes is very flexible. The rules are there for your imagination to build on.

Very simple. Amazing Heroes is written to be as simple as possible to play and to run. If you’re looking for a game for players aged 7+, Amazing Heroes is for you.

boardgame.name: The Partizan Press Guide to War Gaming The Crimean War
boardgame.description:
So why wargame the Crimean War?

Colourful uniforms, organisations and tactics which are comfortably familiar to the Napoleonic war gamer, with just a hint of the technological advances to come. All this and the chance to fight along side different allies and to take on the might of Russia in the process.

So it’s not quite Napoleonics, neither is it the American Civil War. The Crimean War is its own conflict and one that can be almost as far reaching as the war gamer requires.

With an increasing number of figures and rule sets becoming available, perhaps the Crimean War could become ‘the next big thing’ in the world of war games…

Includes historical background, war gaming guidelines, full colour campaign maps and details of the forces that participated.

With scenarios for the following battles complete with full colour maps of the battles & orders of battle:

The Battle of Kurudere - 5th August 1854
The Skirmish on the Bulganak - 19th September 1854
The Battle of the Alma - 20th September 1854
The Siege of Sevastopol September 1854 - September 1855
The Battle of Balaclava - 25th October 1854
The Battle of Inkerman - 5th November 1854
The Battle of Eupatoria - 17th February 1855
The Expedition to Kertch - 1855
The Tchernaya River - 16th August 1855


Includes 17 full colour Bob Marrion plates representing the numerous forces involved in the conflict.
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Esprit de Corps: Power & Glory – Fast Action Wargames Rules for 19th Century Warfare

boardgame.name: Wargaming in Egypt and the Sudan
boardgame.description:
There's something about Victorian colonial exploits that stirs the blood.
Grim faced, khaki clad infantry faced by overwhelming numbers of tribesmen who know no fear and take on troops armed with modern rifles, artillery and machine guns while they themselves have only hand held weapons.
In the Sudan it is all there - the 'fuzzy-wuzzies' of Kipling, the Indian, Egyptian and Sudanese troop types, the renowned Highland infantry, the 21st Lancers, the Camel Corps, the Naval Brigade, the Gatling gun, gun boats, arid terrain, the River Nile - marvellous stuff!

The aim of this book is to provide the reader and war gamer with some idea as to how the campaigns were fought and how they might be re-created on the table top.

This scenario booklet covers three campaigns:

the Nile Campaign 1882,
the Gordon Relief Expedition 1884-1885 and
the Re-conquest of the Sudan 1895-1896


–description from the publisher
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Blood & Sand: Wargame Rules for the Mahdist Wars in the Soudan
The Gatling's Jammed: Wargaming Colonial Warfare in the 19th Century

boardgame.name: Secrets of the Ancient World
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

It is a time of myth and legend, when the ancient gods rules heaven and earth and plagued mankind with suffering. It is a time of vicious warlords, horrific monsters, and twisted intrigues. It is a time of power, of danger, of passion. A time when the land cries out for heroes...

boardgame.name: Hercules: The Legendary Journeys & Xena: Warrior Princess Roleplaying Game
boardgame.description:
User summary:

This boxed set includes:

Hercules & Xena Hero's Guide
Secrets of the Ancient World
Gamemaster's Screen
Favor for a Favor (adventure booklet)
Ixion and Telephus (adventure booklet)
The Shackled Spirit (adventure booklet)
Custom dice set (five purple 6-sided; 1 red 6-sided)

boardgame.name: Hack Slash Loot
boardgame.description:
This expansion comes with a ton of new content and new mini games to keep the game fresh and funky every time you play it. You will be greeted by 3 new heroes: Rogue, Brawler, and the Artificer. There are also new dungeon tiles to explore, events to defeat, more pets to love, and spells to learn.

NEW CONTENT
CHEAT CODES: It has a new Cheat Chest in which you must pick the lock to even open it. If you open the chest, you will be granted with a very powerful cheat code.

WANDERING MONSTERS: These monsters can make an appearance and really shake things up. When you draw this Monster Enhancer, you must draw a Wander Monster which truly can be at any level of difficulty.

CRAFT: You can now craft in the dungeon. Merge 2 treasures together to create 1 stronger treasure!

NEW CO-OP RULES: There are now better rules for trading items in the dungeon as well as assisting in combat with other heroes.

BONUS EXPANSION SUNKEN TREASURE
This is a bonus expansion that you may include into your game. This includes a new hero; the Beast Tamer.

FISHING: You can now fish on water spaces in the dungeon. If you are able to catch these fish, you may feed them to your pets. This will transform your pet into a strong monster with a greater bonus stat. Of course, this is temporary and your pet will then transform back at the start of the next floor.

SUNKEN TREASURES: You can even gain new treasures by fishing, one of which is the powerful artifact THE 7 SEAS SWORD!!!!

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Stuart Asquith's Wargaming 18th Century Battles
boardgame.description:
This book focuses on one of the Stuart Asquith's key interests, 18th century warfare.
The attractions of the period are described, along with nine accounts of key battles 1704-1760. These battles include:

Battle of the Schellenberg (1704)
Battle of Ramillies (1706)
Battle of Sheriffmuir (1715)
Battle of Mollwitz (1741)
Battle of Soor (1745)
Battle of Falkirk (1746)
Battle of Plassey (1757)
Battle of Minden (1759)
Battle of Warburg (1760)


Of course, the book would not be complete without a set of classic 'Old School' wargaming rules.
The obvious choice was Stuart Asquith's popular wargaming rules for Malburian Warfare 1702-1714.

This work is published as part of The History of Wargaming Project range of books that aim to document the development of wargaming.

–description from the publisher
boardgame.boardgamefamily: History: War of the Austrian Succession
History: War of the Spanish Succession

boardgame.name: D&D Starter Set Rulebook
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

The DUNGEONS & DRAGONS roleplaying game is about storytelling in worlds of swords and sorcery. Like games of make-believe, D&D is driven by imagination. It's about picturing a crumbling castle in a darkening forest and imagining how a fantasy adventurer might react to the challenges that scene presents. In this fantasy world, the possibilities are limitless.

boardgame.name: Word for Word
boardgame.description:
Each player takes five face-down letter tablets after shuffling. Divide black tablets equally between all the players. Players then take turns placing black tablets on the board, leaving at least one square (including diagonally) between tablets. Players then take turns making words on the board using the letter tablets, ensuring that the word fits between two black tablets. Each tablet in a completed word scores one point. Highest score wins the game.

—user summary

boardgame.name: VITA MORS: Expansion Pack
boardgame.description:
本擴充包共有５張人物卡。起始配置時使用此組人物卡取代原奴隸牌背的人物卡後即可開始遊玩。

The pack includes 5 character cards. When setting up the game, simply replace the Slaves deck with this pack of cards, and you're ready to go!

５枚の人物カードがこの拡張に入ってます。初期配置の時、奴隷クラスの人物カードの代わりにこちらの人物カードを入れて遊びます。
boardgame.boardgamepublisher: Play With Us Design (玩聚設計)

boardgame.name: Ho-Mo
boardgame.description:
The game is similar to Chess or Draughts. The game board is a 17x25 square grid with red lines demarcating the center circle and penalty areas, hence resembling a soccer field. Five squares on each half of the playing field has a ball. Each player has 11 pawns. Players move alternately and the objective is to move the players directly behind the ball squares. There is no moving ball in this game.

—user summary

boardgame.name: Perturbo
boardgame.description:
Play as one of the 4 alien species that arrived to the Earth to fight for the total control of the planet. These alien species have in common a very powerful technology called "Perturbo" which allows to alterate the ecosystems of the Earth in a short period of time to make it suitable for the species survival.

The game takes place thru 3 ages or rounds where you will try different actions to become the most succesful specie and get the total dominance of the planet. You could use conflict to expulse other species from a territory, alteration to modify ecosystems, movement to move within territories and procreation to multiplicate and populate the Earth.

—description from the designer

Juega como una de las 4 especies alienigenas que han llegado a la tierra para luchar por el control total del planeta. Estas especies alienigenas tienen en común una tecnoligia muy poderosa llamada "Perturbo" la cual es capaz de alterar los ecosistemas terrestres en un corto periodo de tiempo para combertirlos en zonas habitables para la supervivencia de las especies.

El juego tiene lugar en 3 eras o rondas donde trataras diferentes acciones para convertirte en la especie más exitosa y conseguir el dominio total de la Tierra. Podrás usar conflicto para expulsar otras especies de un territorio, alteración para modificar ecosistemas, movimiento para moverte por los territorios del mapa, y procreación para reproducirte y habitar la Tierra.

—description from the designer (Spanish)

boardgame.name: MadMobz
boardgame.description:
MadMobz is a card game that revolves around the idea of rival mobz. Every player commands a different mob, each with their own house, business and car. Everyone has action cards (such as an attack, defend, swat, etc.) with different characteristics and have to properly use them in order to win. The players have to deal with ripdeals, snitches, SWAT teams, gold diggers, hustlers as well as other possible obstacles. In order to win, each participant has to manage resources and eliminate the rival mobz.

How do you play MadMobz?


Choose your infamous gang! Who are you? The Chicago Boss, The Sicilian Family, The Mexican Cartel, The NY Connection, The Cuban Stars, The Colombian King, or The Black Widow.
Put your gang members in the right place and take out all other gangs!
Make sure to attack their car, business and home to take out the Gangleader!


The game has 88 playing cards and 40 team cards.

Playing Cards:
In the game, there are attack cards with which you have to take out the other gangs, which can be defended with defence cards such as 'defend'.

With the action cards, you can bully the gangs by, for example, placing the 'Alliance' card between 2 gangs (their fate is now the same). Block these nasty plague cards with the 'Get the F *ck out' card!

The game also has 'super cards' such as 'Earthquake' to destroy all houses or Frankenstein to bring a defeated gang member back to life.

If you want to take out the gangs with a good blow, start a GangWar.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Selsia
boardgame.description:
You are a spaceship captain and you cruise your ship between planets to create your own destiny. You can perform different kinds of jobs. You can be a bounty hunter or sabotage others. You can deliver cargo or perform heroic acts. You want to become famous and it is up to you to decide how to reach your objectives. You might get involved into politics and decide to support the terrans or the Aeroneans. Or you might ignore both and try to pick your own quest. The possibilities are limitless in Selsia, but one thing remains constant: you must keep getting stronger! Upgrade your spaceship and recruit crew members to help you reach your goals.

Selsia is a 1-4 players game that takes 30-75 minutes to play. Players will compete throughout the game for fame. The player with the most fame points wins. In Selsia, the following mechanisms are utilized: action selection, area control, pickup and delivery, rondel movement and dice rolling.

In the start of the game, each player get their own spaceships. Later on, players will have the chance to upgrade different parts of their spaceships using a catalog of at least 28 unique upgrades that allow different strategies and provide a high replay value. Each upgrade slots into the player board based on its type giving a nice visual appeal and a sense of advancement. Players will install new weapons, better defense systems, stronger battery units, better engines, ...

Selsia uses various unique and easy to grasp mechanisms. Players have to move their spaceships and perform an action, it's that simple. The rules are easy to learn, but making the right decision is not so easy. There are many strategies available to choose from, and the best of them all is revealed only at the end of each game. And the icing on the cake is a novel, rewarding and exciting combat system.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: MadSoccer X Touzani
boardgame.description:
In MadSoccer, every player will be responsible for their own national football team, making sure to tactically defeat the opponents. Everyone has action cards (including attack, defence, penalties, etc.) with different characteristics, and has to properly and thoughtfully use them in order to win. For the game to end, the participants have to manage resources and eliminate the defenders, midfielders and strikers of the rival teams.

How To Play:

Choose your favourite football team! (Netherlands, Belgium, Spain, France, Germany, Portugal, Turkey, and England)
Put your players in the right place and take out all opponents!
First, defeat their defenders - midfielders - forwards and score a goal to kick your opponents out of the tournament.


Defeat your opponents by using attack cards to take out their players. With the action cards, you can bully your fellow players by, for example, taking their cards, having them skip a turn, stealing a player and even more 'nasty' bullying cards! Of course, you can also defend your players in this game with the defence cards (blocks the attack card) or the offside card (blocks the action card). There are also 'super cards' in the game, each of which has a special power. If you really quickly kick your opponent out of the tournament, throw up the 'Penalty' card to take out multiple players immediately. Each team also has a Coach and can be used against the most dangerous attacks to defend you from the other player's attempts to score a goal.

—description from the publisher

Met MadSoccer breng je de spanning van het EK naar je woonkamer! MadSoccer geeft jou de kans met jouw team de rest van de andere teams te verslaan en zo de competitie te winnen.

—description from the publisher (Dutch)

boardgame.name: Abduction!
boardgame.description:
(from the rulebook)
They're here!
Abduction is a set of fast play Sci-Fi rules. They are set in a near future America, in a time when alien encounters have become common, and fights between American defence forces and alien snatch squads are everyday occurences. These rules are designed to recreate these encounters; fighting small skirmishes between a dozen or so human figures and a handful of aliens.

Published as 16p A5 booklet, also containing a quick reference sheet.

boardgame.name: Dark Overlord Reigns
boardgame.description:
Dark Overlord Reigns is a semi-abstract game of warfare that takes place in a forsaken fantasy world. White cubes represent forces that allow you to protect, fight, and perform tasks. You also manage three heroic leaders that journey around the tile map to aid your forces against the Dark Overlord; the rising threat to the free nations.

Designed as a solitaire game, forces of the Dark Overlord are controlled by the game system. These forces consist of black cubes (dark army), blue cubes (hellbreed), and purple cubes (ghoul hordes). The dark army represents the overlord’s regular army, the hellbreed represents his supernatural army, and the ghoul hordes represent his enslaved army.

Throughout the game you are attempting to build up your white cubes while keeping the rival cubes to a minimum. A major feature in the game is “worker placement”. To overcome the Dark Overlord you must have your task force cubes (workers) fulfill various missions in order to recruit more forces and outwit the Dark Overlord. Ultimately, you must prevail in a final battle on the center tile in order to win the game.

A game turn consists of 3 phases. The first phase involves the emergence of rival cubes. The second phase involves the fulfilment of task spot effects (based on the accomplishments of your task force cubes). The third phase of the turn allows you decision-making opportunities using your heroes. At this point you can move your heroes, perform combat, deploy forces, pick up forces, and drop off runestones.

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: Polders: Flip & Write
boardgame.description:
In Polders: Flip & Write you will be a 17th century Dutch investor that invested in the creation of the Dutch polders Beemster, Schermer, Wijde Wormer and Purmer. Flip and Write your way to the best combinations of fields, gardens, mills, farms and manors. But be careful! After each time you 'write', you hand your polder to the player on your left.

The game is set in the 17th century in the Netherlands, a time when the country was experiencing a massive economic boost and merchants were looking for ways to increase food production. As a result, they came up with massive projects to enclose lakes with dikes and pump out the water with windmills. The resulting low-lying tract of land is known as a polder. One polder was qualified as an UNESCO World Heritage site: the Beemster Polder. The Beemster has a solid dike of 42 kilometers long, was pumped dry with 43 windmills, has its lowest point at 7 meters (23 feet) below sea level, and has a surface of 72 square kilometers (nearly 28 square miles). The land created in this polder, and the three polders created in the following decades, was incredibly fertile and therefore mostly used for farms. But the rich and powerful of the nearby city of Amsterdam also created ‘buitenplaatsen’ (country houses or manors). In the game Polders, the four big polders created in the first half of the 17th century are your playing field.

—description from the publisher

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Title: Polders: Flip & Write Publisher: Jolly Dutch Productions Language(s): English Dutch

boardgame.name: Tridoru
boardgame.description:
Tridoru is a fast paced strategy game where two players will represent a clan, Mikoto or Kawagama, trying to conquer the reign of Tridoru.

Clans will use cards to deploy troop tokens in a 3x3 square grid board. You will have to carefully select these cards, since they will deploy your troops, but they will also deploy the other clan's troops.

Once a square has enough troop tokens on it, the clan will deploy a camp token on it. The first player who completes 3 squares in a row with camps wins the game. But watch the other clan, as they can steal your position.

—description from the designer

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

boardgame.name: Дата: Фрагменти Історії (Date: Fragments of History)
boardgame.description:
Дата: Фрагменти Історії ("Date: Fragments of History") is a quick historical game designed in the style of comic books.
The game includes 100 events from the political and cultural life of Ukraine. The players need to arrange their events correctly in a chronological order and prevent their opponents from doing so.

The game is similar to Timeline: General Interest.

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

boardgame.name: Bog-a-ten
boardgame.description:
Being a lively distraction for gentlemen and ladies not of a nervous disposition, involving cards and miniature figurines.

The game is an expedition towards the mystical temple of Bog-a-ten. Parties travel from island to island, encountering prehistoric monsters, traps, and other enemies.

The game started as a convention game at Salute '97 (miniature wargaming convention), but the rules were published as an A4 spiral-bound rulebook, counting 18 pages.

Each player starts with a party onboard a small ship. Movement by ship is between islands. Once the party sets foot on an island, an encounter can occur, a trap can be found, etc. The goal of the game is to reach the island with the temple, and trying to escape again, upon which the game is won by that party.

The whole game is played on a table with scenery, miniatures, etc.

—description from the publisher
boardgame.boardgamepublisher: HLBS Publishing (The Honourable Lead Boiler Suit Company)

boardgame.name: College of Terpsichore
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

The college of Terpsichore consists of Bards who utilize their bodies and dancing in place of spell focuses or instruments. They can work swift movement and charming effects into their performances, as well as manipulate the bodies of others under the right conditions.

boardgame.name: Nesha Ivanova & Eiji Kanda
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Ironically, building her vast technological empire required Bentley to hire people with the powers she claimed to oppose. She needed such individuals to eliminate enemies, bully rivals, and remove incriminating evidence of the Trust’s misdeeds. She assembled a team to serve as troubleshooters and problem-solvers. This team enjoys the freedom and latitude to deal with problems however they see fit so long as they don’t endanger the Trust itself. Two of the more unusual troubleshooters include Nesha Ivanova and Eiji Kanda. Together, these two personalities seem like exact opposites, and yet together they’ve proven themselves efficient and, when necessary, lethal. When Bentley encounters a particularly vexing problem, she assigns Ivanova and Kanda to handle it.

This PDF contains everything you need to know about the Mosaic Trust members, Nesha Ivanova & Eiji Kanda, in the Amazing Universe Campaign or any other superhero campaign.
boardgame.rpgseries: Official Handbook of the Amazing Universe

boardgame.name: Ex Libris
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

In 1593, the Agents of Dee set out to Deptford in search of a lost remnant from the sacking of Mortlake, Dee’s home. The paper trail indicates the owner of a home in Deptford village received an annotated copy of The Book of Dead Names, and Dee wants it back.

The problem? He isn’t the only one who wants it.

The Dee Sanction is a tabletop role-playing game about serving Queen and country in the late Tudor period. While kingdoms vie for power and the Church splinters under the pressure of reform, folklorish creatures emerge from enforced hiding seeking revenge against those who imprisoned them.

The PDF includes a single A4 format, 2-page adventure, including a map of the adventure's location and stats for the primary protagonist.

boardgame.name: Might and Main
boardgame.description:
These rules are designed for wargaming naval battles of the medieval age in the seas of Western Europe. The rules aim to give the feel of the period, whilst being simple and fast-playing. Book-keeping has been kept to a minimum and the types of ships involved have been simplified into broad categories.

—description from the rulebook

boardgame.name: Litanies of the Lost
boardgame.description:
Publisher blurb:

"FOUR GRIM ADVENTURES IN THE DARKNESS OF IMPERIUM NIHILUS

Bathed in the corrupt light of the Great Rift, the Gilead System is rife with peril. Vile xenos assail humanity from all sides, internecine strife between the factions of the Imperium threaten a catastrophic civil war, and daemonic entities penetrate reality from Cicatrix Maledictum.

Discover devious plots and unravel murderous mysteries amongst feuding faiths on the agri world of Ostia. Investigate tech heresy, mechanical misdemeanours, and arcane rituals amongst the manufactora of the forge world Avachrus. Protect the holy shrine world of Enoch from enemies without, and traitors within.

Litanies of the Lost contains four exciting scenarios suitable for Wrath & Glory characters of Tiers 1 and 2. These can be played as entertaining stand-alone adventures, or combined into a perilous planet-hopping campaign that highlights the political strife and myriad dangers present in the Gilead System.

Litanies of the Lost includes:


Duty Beyond Death: something has gone nightmarishly wrong at the Pakthertius Servitor Manufactorum — investigate to discover its arcane technological secrets, and try to be the first to emerge alive!



Dark Bidding: a clandestine contract to procure a stolen stasis coffin with mysterious contents leads the party deep into the mechanical bowels of the Adeptus Mechanicus’s underworld.



Grim Harvest: a spate of strange deaths at an agri world mega-acreage threatens its crucial crops, but the source may be more sinister than the frictions between the competing Imperial factions in the area.



Vow of Silence: an investigation of potential heretical activity at a silent monastery goes awry when some unexpected — and murderous — guests arrive."

boardgame.name: A Song of Ice & Fire: Tabletop Miniatures Game – Greyjoy Starter Set
Le Trône de Fer: le Jeu de Figurines – Starter Greyjoy
boardgame.description:
While the natives of the Iron Islands technically bend the knee to whomever sits the Iron Throne, the Ironborn are taking full advantage of the chaos in Westeros to raid its coastlines and mercantile shipping like never before. The Ironborn are not an army dedicated to protracted engagements, but rather a rapid-moving force built around subduing enemies and inflicting as much damage as possible before fading back into the Sunset Sea from whence they came. In an age of strife and internecine war, the only true victors are those that carry away the greater share of the spoils, and the Ironborn are built to do exactly that.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: A Song of Ice & Fire: Tabletop Miniatures Game – Stormcrow Dervishes
Le Trône de Fer: le Jeu de Figurines – Derviches Corbeaux Tornade
boardgame.description:
Stormcrow Dervishes represent some of their best-trained veteran troops. These hardened veterans can move rapidly despite medium armor, and attack exposed elements, even at long distances across the battlefield. As with all Stormcrows, a little extra coins goes a long way, and these veterans didn't get where they are by taking coin without delivering added performance. They can engage swiftly from surprising distances, strike hard, then fade back to the relative safety of their own lines. If pinned, they can hold their own against even heavy troops, though not for long. Staying mobile is their best defense.

—description from the publisher
boardgame.boardgamefamily: Books: A Song of Ice and Fire
Game: A Song of Ice & Fire – Tabletop Miniatures Game
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: A Song of Ice & Fire: Tabletop Miniatures Game – Stark vs Lannister Starter Set

listing.notes:
The Stormcrow mercenary company is well known throughout all of Westeros for their love of money. When hiring them to fight their battles, the different Houses know how to get the best out of them… simply offer them more coin. The Dervishes are one of the most prized items on the mercenary’s “menu,” being their most veteran skirmishers, ready to fight hard… for a price.
-A new melee unit to add to your ranks!
-A neutral unit that can be added to any army
-With moderate speed, they can reach the enemy quickly
-Not a standalone product. A copy of the Song of Ice and Fire starter set is needed to play
Language : English Hobby type : Advanced Age : 14+ Time : 45-60 min Number of players : 2

boardgame.name: A Song of Ice & Fire: Tabletop Miniatures Game – War Mammoths
Le Trône de Fer: le Jeu de Figurines – Mammouths de Guerre
boardgame.description:
Although not many Mammoths remain in the world, those trained by the Free Folk and their Giant allies are true juggernauts of destruction on the battlefield. While their size makes them easy targets, their thick, hairy hides shrug off even strong blows. Mammoths attack with their tusks, trunk, and feet, and few units can withstand a Mammoth on the rampage. Such a beast ignores enemy lines and tramples anything in its path. Mammoths are well-trained and difficult to rattle, which is fortunate, because a panicked Mammoth is one's ally on the battlefield.

—description from the publisher
boardgame.boardgamefamily: Books: A Song of Ice and Fire
Game: A Song of Ice & Fire – Tabletop Miniatures Game
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: A Song of Ice & Fire: Tabletop Miniatures Game – Baratheon Starter Set
A Song of Ice & Fire: Tabletop Miniatures Game – Free Folk Starter Set
A Song of Ice & Fire: Tabletop Miniatures Game – Greyjoy Starter Set
A Song of Ice & Fire: Tabletop Miniatures Game – Night's Watch Starter Set
A Song of Ice & Fire: Tabletop Miniatures Game – Stark vs Lannister Starter Set
A Song of Ice & Fire: Tabletop Miniatures Game – Targaryen Starter Set

listing.notes:
There are many strange creatures that live north of the Wall. Most people in Westeros could only dream of giant, furry elephants covered in armor and spikes trampling through a battlefield. Unfortunately for the enemies of the Free Folk, these War Mammoths are very real, and they are coming south with the rest of the Free Folk forces.
Language : English Hobby type : Advanced Age : 14+ Time : 45-60 min Number of players : 2

boardgame.name: A Song of Ice & Fire: Tabletop Miniatures Game – Ironmakers
Le Trône de Fer: le Jeu de Figurines – Forgefers
boardgame.description:
The heavily armored men of House Ironmaker often serve as the main center of an Ironborn force where a dedicated line is called for. Their thick scale armor over boiled leather allows them to withstand strong assaults and even cavalry charges. That said, their "heavy armor" is equivalent to the medium infantry of most landbound forces. But the Ironborn have always been a mobile force, and even this heavier version of their signature scale mail offers superior mobility. Used intelligently, the Ironmakers can even the odds against even the strongest enemies.

—description from the publisher
boardgame.boardgamefamily: Books: A Song of Ice and Fire
Game: A Song of Ice & Fire – Tabletop Miniatures Game
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: A Song of Ice & Fire: Tabletop Miniatures Game – Stark vs Lannister Starter Set

boardgame.name: A Song of Ice & Fire: Tabletop Miniatures Game – Ironborn Trappers
Le Trône de Fer: le Jeu de Figurines – Trappeurs Fer-Nés
boardgame.description:
Capturing thralls is part of the Ironborn reaving tradition, and the Ironborn Trappers excel at bringing enemies in alive. Trappers are not built for the front lines, but rather for flanking and hindering heavier enemy units with their long, barbed spears and entangling nets. With Trappers on one side and virtually any other unit on the other, even the most heavily armored knights will find themselves overwhelmed and defeated in short order. That said, Trappers are not suited to protracted engagements, and fall easy prey to long-range archery.

—description from the publisher
boardgame.boardgamefamily: Books: A Song of Ice and Fire
Game: A Song of Ice & Fire – Tabletop Miniatures Game
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: A Song of Ice & Fire: Tabletop Miniatures Game – Baratheon Starter Set
A Song of Ice & Fire: Tabletop Miniatures Game – Free Folk Starter Set
A Song of Ice & Fire: Tabletop Miniatures Game – Greyjoy Starter Set
A Song of Ice & Fire: Tabletop Miniatures Game – Night's Watch Starter Set
A Song of Ice & Fire: Tabletop Miniatures Game – Stark vs Lannister Starter Set
A Song of Ice & Fire: Tabletop Miniatures Game – Targaryen Starter Set

boardgame.name: A Song of Ice & Fire: Tabletop Miniatures Game – Greyjoy Heroes I
Le Trône de Fer: le Jeu de Figurines – Héros Greyjoy I
boardgame.description:
With the Seven Kingdoms distracted by internecine war, the Kraken banner rises once more to threaten coastlines across Westeros! The lords and heroes of House Greyjoy lead their armies to victory in skirmishes and raids, bringing back the spoils of the fertile mainland. From Theon's reckless tactics to Euron's subtle cruelty to Balon's formidable strategies, House Greyjoy is poised to reap rewards far beyond those ever written of in the sagas of old. With them come their loyal retainers Erik Ironmaker, Qarl the Maid, Nute the Barber, and Maester Wendamyr, powerful champions and political players in their own right, each ready and willing to pay the Iron Price for their lords.

—description from the publisher
boardgame.boardgamefamily: Books: A Song of Ice and Fire
Game: A Song of Ice & Fire – Tabletop Miniatures Game
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: A Song of Ice & Fire: Tabletop Miniatures Game – Stark vs Lannister Starter Set

boardgame.name: Scutarii: Tournament Edition
boardgame.description:
Scutarii: Tournament Edition is a complete miniatures system for the Age of Antiquity.
Covering the period from 3000 B.C. to 1450 A.D., Scutarii brings to gamers a fast-paced system with all the detail designed to resolve large scale battles within three to four hours.

Covers all the major and minor weapons and tactics
Can use any basing and scale from other popular rulesets
Get a conclusion within three to four hours
Designed for scenario and tournament play
Complete point system and various optional rules
Full army lists included
Nine complete scenarios included: Hydaspes, Raphia, Pharsalus, Nemea, Marathon, Asculum, Callinicum and more!
Conversion tools for using other popular army lists
Weather, terrain and strategic movement


–description from the back of the book
boardgame.boardgamefamily: History: Greek & Persian conflicts of the 4th century BC
History: Wars of Alexander the Great
History: Wars of the Diadochi and Syrian Wars

boardgame.name: Die Insel der Katzen: 2-Minuten-Box
The Isle of Cats: The Big '2-minute' Box
boardgame.description:
The Big '2-minute' Box comes with a wooden storage solution designed to drastically reduce the amount of time it takes to setup and pack away The Isle of Cats.

It will hold The Isle of Cats game and all of its expansions, including the promos and Kickstarter Packs. It fits sleeved cards, the large upgraded meeples, and even has room for an extra Bag’o’Fish, just in case you decide to double your supply.

The box has been designed to assist you in setting up the game and getting you playing in just 2-minutes!
boardgame.boardgameaccessory: The Isle of Cats: Boat Pack
The Isle of Cats: Kickstarter Pack
The Isle of Cats: Kickstarter Pack 2
The Isle of Cats: Kittens + Beasts
The Isle of Cats: Late Arrivals

listing.notes: weight: 4328 grams + packaging

boardgame.name: Horror in the Appalling Hills
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

You have been asked to go to Green Village on the eastern most frontier of the Empire of Bonparr to meet with this person and to go into the hills near Magnatap to investigate his claims. The mysterious man, known only as Grax, has exposed and helped to capture an "alien" spy in Green Village. A local humanoid merchant, named Fogner, had had his brain removed and "replaced" by an intelligent mobile brain creature. The body and "brain creature" is still being examined by members of the Healers in Jainus.

boardgame.name: Eagle's Prey: Advance & Retreat – Regimental Rules for the American Civil War 1861-1865
boardgame.description:
Eagle's Prey: Advance & Retreat Regimental Rules for the American Civil War 1861-1865 is a complete and comprehensive supplement for the Age of Lincoln and the American Civil War!

Advance & Retreat allows players to refight the struggle the Union!

Refight the battles or create new ones with our scenario generation tools
Allows for a 20,000 man game to be completed in 3-4 hours
Can be used with any scale and no rebasing needed
Covers the various factions and forces list
Features HRG’s Terrain Generation system
Follows historical organization and unit capabilities
Includes a Scenario generator and player aid tools
Rated Leaders for Brigade and Division command
Command Brigade Level or regimental action
Includes a scenarios with more available online Features Naval rules for transports
Can be used with CASEMATE & CANNON Civil War Naval Rules


–description from back of the book

boardgame.name: Dark Domains: 2020 Lab Rat Gift Cards
boardgame.description:
A set of six Obscure Arcana card that can be added to the base game's fortune card mix.

Includes: Aeon, TheUniverse, The Void, Aether, The Four Winds, and Time

These were originally sent as gifts to the Lab Rats of Laboratory H.

boardgame.name: The Book of Random Tables: Steampunk
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Do you play Space 1889, Etherscope, Iron Kingdoms, Tephra: The Steampunk RPG, or another steampunk RPG?

29 D100 Random Tables for Steampunk RPGs.

Cut down your GM prep with random tables like Airship Cargo, Artifacts, Drugs and Medicines, Items in a Desk, Items in a Scientist’s Lab, Items in a Study, Steam Engine and Boiler Parts, Cavern Locations and Encounters, Non-Combat Encounters, Adventure Hooks and Settings, Names, and more.

boardgame.name: KeyForge Adventures: Abyssal Conspiracy
키포지 어드벤처: 심해의 비밀결사
boardgame.description:
After defeating the Keyraken, the first adventure in KeyForge Adventures, the Archons find that the danger has not yet abated, for their ship is crippled by a mysterious saboteur who escapes before justice can be served! In this second adventure, you must navigate a grid of nine locations as you descend into the ocean’s depths to uncover the conspiracy and find the tool you will need to put an end to its villainy. Exploring the ocean’s depths is a dangerous and uncertain undertaking, and whatever force is attempting to foil the Archons is not waiting around to be stopped. As the tide shifts against you, can you stop this conspiracy before it unleashes an otherworldly power across the Crucible?

—description from the publisher
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Keyforge Adventures: Rise of the Keyraken

boardgame.name: ANGELSPAWN Ashcan Edition
boardgame.description:
publisher blurb

ANGELSPAWN is a game about powerful beings protecting their world from unspeakable evil and terrible monstrosities, wielding their amazing abilities to crush their foes, and attaining powerful items to increase their already staggering might. It is a game about fighting against an inexorable tide of monsters and demons set upon the destruction of this world. It is a love letter to the dungeon crawling, collecting, and grinding games I grew up playing, specifically the Diablo series.

This game seeks to create an experience similar to playing these types of games: fast and frenetic combat featuring amazing abilities and powerful blows, a never-ending flow of enemies, and a hunt for more and more powerful gear to bolster your power. Game sessions are meant to feel like exploring an area, made up of increasingly difficult encounters of enemies, leading to a terrifying final act against an awesome foe. You will constantly need to push the limits of your abilities to find the gear you will need to finish the fight once and for all.

boardgame.name: Guerra del anillo: El destino de Erebor
War of the Ring: The Fate of Erebor
Wojna o Pierścień: Los Ereboru
Война кольца: Судьба Эребора
boardgame.description:
The Fate of Erebor is a promotional item included with copies of "The Battle of Five Armies" Collector's Edition and given out with first print copies of the revised edition of "The Battle of Five Armies" board game.

It is an alternate setup of "War of the Ring" with which you can play when the Shadow player wins "The Battle of Five Armies" board game. Contains alternate map tiles, character cards, and event cards for the "War of the Ring" base game.
boardgame.boardgamefamily: Series: War of the Ring (Nexus/Ares Games)
